BackstoryDef.title: urchin thief
BackstoryDef.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up poor and hungry on a big city, learning to fend for [PAWN_objective]self.
At first, [PAWN_pronoun] only took what [PAWN_pronoun] needed. Then [PAWN_pronoun] learned to take what [PAWN_pronoun] wanted.

BackstoryDef.title: smuggler kid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents used [PAWN_objective] to help smuggle contraband across the frontier.\n\nAided by [PAWN_possessive] small size, [PAWN_nameDef] became very adept at carrying out [PAWN_possessive] parents' missions, learning weaponry, negotiations, and most of all smuggling.

BackstoryDef.title: idealistic cadet
BackstoryDef.description:
Raised in the military traditions of [PAWN_possessive] forefathers, [PAWN_nameDef] was taught from a young age that [PAWN_pronoun] would be a great leader and the hero of [PAWN_possessive] family.
[PAWN_pronoun] excelled at [PAWN_possessive] studies and graduated from the academy with honors.

BackstoryDef.title: Steward's assisant
BackstoryDef.description:
A steward on a merchant ship, [PAWN_nameDef] was well-traveled on [PAWN_possessive] homeland by [PAWN_possessive] early teens.
The constant orders from [PAWN_possessive] captain, however, fostered a defiant streak, as well as a general disaste for anything [PAWN_pronoun] considered to be busywork.

BackstoryDef.title: nomad
BackstoryDef.description:
Born to a nomadic family, [PAWN_nameDef] was instructed in the arts of speechcraft, sleight of hand, horse riding.
[PAWN_pronoun] was always running around the camp doing odd jobs to help [PAWN_possessive] extended family.

BackstoryDef.title: abandoned orphan
BackstoryDef.description:
Abandoned at birth, young [PAWN_nameDef] started [PAWN_possessive] life in an orphanage.
A rascal and a scoundrel, [PAWN_pronoun] became a clever troublemaker.

BackstoryDef.title: adventurous youth
BackstoryDef.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] explored all around [PAWN_possessive] family's large estate, uncovering little natural wonders hidden in nearby catacombs, rivers, and caves.
During [PAWN_possessive] teenage years, [PAWN_nameDef] made numerous enemies

BackstoryDef.title: ranger child
BackstoryDef.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a forest. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught how hunt and live off the land, so that [PAWN_pronoun] could live without the need of others.
Accustomed to manual labor and with an intuitive mind, [PAWN_nameDef] could survive weeks alone.

BackstoryDef.title: caravan traveler
BackstoryDef.description: Born to a family of traveling merchants, [PAWN_nameDef] was mentored by [PAWN_possessive] father in the ways of being a trader. [PAWN_pronoun] was often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Due to [PAWN_possessive] nomadic lifestyle, [PAWN_pronoun] hunted and bartered for [PAWN_possessive] food.

BackstoryDef.title: tinkerer
BackstoryDef.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] spare time creating things from [PAWN_possessive] imagination out of scrap metal and discarded machinery.
[PAWN_pronoun] created simple doodads and small tools, for both for fun and for utility.

BackstoryDef.title: trainee alchemist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] learned the basics of alchemy and medicine in one the few monastic schools on [PAWN_possessive] homeland.

BackstoryDef.title: abductee
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was abducted at a young age and forced to do menial labor on a pirate ship.

BackstoryDef.title: squire
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as a knight in training. [PAWN_pronoun] trained directly under the king's war adviser for most of [PAWN_possessive] youth, and learned to fight with many martial weapons.
